attributes.name: header
attributes.description: Column header. The default value is the header,legend or name attribute of the signal

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Column label. The default value is the unit of the y axis, or the label attribute, or ylabel + unit if specified

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: Column number format. Please refer to https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/i18n/format/decimalFormat.html for a description

attributes.name: fontSize
attributes.description: Column font size. Will be used when renderin the table in a report,etc.
